etcd_advertise_client_urls.description: list of this member's client URLs to advertise to clients

etcd_cert_file.description: path to the client server TLS cert file

etcd_cipher_suites.description: list of ciphers to use for etcd TLS configuration

etcd_client_urls.description: client URLs to use when operating as an etcd client

etcd_key_file.description: path to the client server TLS key file

etcd_max_request_bytes.description: maximum etcd request size in bytes (use with caution)

etcd_trusted_ca_file.description: path to the client server TLS trusted CA cert file
